entities

Class Playlist

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.Action
      • entities.Playlist
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Playlist
extends Action
implements java.io.Serializable
    Playlist class contains a ArrayList with instance of Song class for simulates a Playlist of songs and different options to apply
    Author:
    Jhonatan Guzmán
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
